page.title: 02HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content:
During the past years there has been a steady increase in house building for private ownership.Types of houses are cottage,villa or bungalow style. Few tenements exist.Furnished rooms are scarce,houses are often let. Grangehill,Adderley,Fothringham and Broomhill are large housing estates on the hilly slopes north of the High St. In the field above Grange School a new building site,30 houses to begin with, is being developed this year 1985. Hamish lives in a bungalow built in 1973.It has been extended making it T- shaped and the garden smaller.His poem written in class expresses his feeling
Clang!Clash!Thud!Thud!Clang!Clash! The digger dashes against the rock working all day long clashing on and on and on.To lay foundations in the earth continual clashing on and on.
